LightningComponentBundle.description: Lightning Web Component for CVMA Event RSVP functionality with privacy controls and summary statistics

property.name: eventId
property.label: Event ID
property.description: The Event record ID to display RSVP functionality for

property.name: showSummary
property.label: Show RSVP Summary
property.description: Whether to display the RSVP summary statistics

property.name: allowNotes
property.label: Allow Notes
property.description: Whether to allow members to add notes with their RSVP

property.name: allowPlusOne
property.label: Allow Plus One
property.description: Whether to allow members to bring guests
